seo: 用友,GRP-U8,SQL注入,远程命令执行,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测用友GRP-U8系统是否存在SQL注入到远程命令执行的漏洞，通过发送特定构造的HTTP请求并验证响应来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Yonyou GRP-U8 system has a vulnerability from SQL injection to remote command execution. It confirms the existence of the vulnerability by sending specially crafted HTTP requests and verifying the response.
